Contributing¶

Installation¶

Follow usage:Installation, replacing the final step as follows.

(eos) $ pip install -e .

Development Workflow¶

Use the GitHub commandline interface to speed up development. Make sure to follow best practices.

  1. Create an issue, and optionally add a label

$ gh issue create

  1. Create a branch named according to the issue type, description, and issue number.

$ git checkout -b feature/brilliant-new-feature/42

  1. Solve the issue and include tests and documentation if appropriate.

  2. Make some commits.

$ git add changed_file
$ git commit -m "adds new brilliant feature"

  1. Merge main to the development branch and resolve any conflicts.

$ git merge main

  1. Create a pull request and note its number(e.g. 43).

$ gh pr create

  1. Merge the pull request and reference the issue.

$ gh pr merge 43 --body "Solves #42."
